## Scrollbar.set() method

Set the scrollbar handle's position.

**Signature:**

```typescript
set(value: number, updateMetrics?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number | The content displacement, relative to the view in pixels. |
|  updateMetrics | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether to update metrics on this set call. Defaults to true. |

**Returns:**

void
